## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any debugging code or console logs

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in a Docker environment
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if UI changes)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated API documentation if endpoints changed
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary

### Security & Configuration

- [ ] I have not committed any sensitive data (.env, printers.json, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated .env.example if new environment variables were added
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have updated configuration examples if needed

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt if dependencies changed
- [ ] I have tested that the application builds successfully
- [ ] I have verified no dependency conflicts exist
